item.title: Fish Hunter available on iPhone!
item.dc:creator: abe
item.description:
May 24, 2010 – Fish Hunter is now available on the iTunes store!
Forget the fishing pole, in Fish Hunter all you need is your trusty shotgun! Blast fish out of the water, but watch out for the sharks which are hunting you! Too many fish? Sharks about to catch you? No problem! [...]
item.content:encoded:
May 24, 2010 – Fish Hunter is now available on the iTunes store!

Forget the fishing pole, in Fish Hunter all you need is your trusty shotgun! Blast fish out of the water, but watch out for the sharks which are hunting you! Too many fish? Sharks about to catch you? No problem! Unleash devastating multi-shot attacks, dynamite explosions, and freeze bombs to keep the situation under control. Finally, compete with others for the title of Top Fish Hunter on the global scoreboard!

Developed by Plasmaworks and published on the iPhone by EpicTilt, the popular Palm game has received a graphics upgrade with smoother animation, more detail, and particle effects.

You can find screen shots and more information here:

http://www.plasmaworks.com/fish_hunter
